sentences.english: In recent years, China's urban poverty problem is increasingly serious, urban minimal assurance households have been generating.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是对城市低保家庭生活状况的扫描。

sentences.english: Branch of various civil administration is comprehensive and normative system of small custodial put in order.
sentences.chinese: 各级民政部门全面规范了低保管理制度。

sentences.english: A Lo-fi prototype is simply a picture or a simple model of the system.
sentences.chinese: 低保真原型只是一张图或是系统的一个简单模型。

sentences.english: The families receiving allowances will have qualifications checked once or twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 每年应对低保户资格进行一到两次核查。

sentences.english: They have very little interaction with other recipients, perhaps because they are ashamed," Solinger said.
sentences.chinese: 他们和其他低保户接触非常少，也许因为感觉没面子。
